feed.title: Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:08 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 5:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -9.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -10.3°C
Wind: WSW 7 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries. Snow squalls early this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
